jminusminus

? CLPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • jminusminus.CLPath

  • class CLPath
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can be used to locate and load system, extension, and user-defined class files from directories and zip (jar) files. The code for this class has been adapted from the Kopi (http://www.dms.at/kopi/) project.

    • ?????

      ??? 
      ??????
      CLPath()
      Construct a CLPath object.
      CLPath(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String extdir)
      Construct a CLPath object.

    • ????

      ???? ???? ???? 
      ?????? ?????
      CLInputStream loadClass(java.lang.String name)
      Return a CLInputStream instance for the class with specified name (fully-qualified; tokens separated by '/') or null if the class was not found.

      • ??????? java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • ???????

      • CLPath

        public CLPath()
        Construct a CLPath object.

      • CLPath

        public CLPath(java.lang.String path,
              java.lang.String extdir)
        Construct a CLPath object.
        ??:
        path - the directory names defining the class path, separated by path separator.
        extdir - the directory for the Java extension classes.

    • ??????

      • loadClass

        public CLInputStream loadClass(java.lang.String name)
        Return a CLInputStream instance for the class with specified name (fully-qualified; tokens separated by '/') or null if the class was not found.
        ??:
        name - the fully-qualified name of the class -- java/util/ArrayList for example.
        ??:
        a CLInputStream instance for the class with specified name or null if the class was not found.
